paragraphs.text:
%md
# this is a sampe notesbook to demonstarate:
- accessing data in db via jdbc interperter
-- postgres
-- mysql
-- phoenix
-- hive

- installing and running shell scripts (+impersonation)
- sqoop data from jdbc to hdfs
- sqoop data from jdbc to hive/ORC
- 
-- laod data tp phoenix from sqoop/hdfs import
-- laod data to phoemix via psql
-- load data to phoenix via spark (TL)

#Cluster Notes
#Shell notes
#DB notes
- Postgres
- Mysql

#Secure Cluster Notes

%sh
whoami

%sh

echo get git
[[ $(command -v git) ]] || sudo yum install git -y

echo get wget
[[ $(command -v wget) ]] || sudo yum install wget -y
cd ~

echo check destination dir
[[ -d ~/phxdemo ]] &&  mv ~/phxdemo  ~/phxdem.bck-`date +%s`

echo clone repo
git clone https://github.com/edennuriel/tableau-odbc-phoenix-tutorial ~/phxdemo

msg.data:
get git
get wget
check destination dir
clone repo
Cloning into '/home/admin/phxdemo'...

ERROR:  database "corp" already exists
ERROR:  role "admin" already exists
GRANT

paragraphs.text:
%sh

export mysqlhost=enhdpm
export mysqluser=root
export mysqlpass=admin

#test connection localmode
dbs=""
dbs=$(mysql mysql -e "show databases;" 2>/dev/null )
if [[ -z $dbs ]] ; then 
    echo failed connecting locally
    dbs=$(mysql -h $mysqlhost -u $mysqluser -p$mysqlpass mysql -e  "show databases;" 2>/dev/null )
    if [[ -z $dbs ]] ; then
        echo failed connecting with host: $mysqlhost user: $mysqluser password: $mysqlpass
    fi
fi
echo $dbs

cd  ~/phxdemo
#todo: [[ command -v mysql ]] || yum install -y mysql //client and server if needed
./mysql_load.sh $mysqlhost  2>stdout 2>stderr

msg.data:
failed connecting locally
Database information_schema ambari hive mysql performance_schema

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc
select * from corp.sales limit 10;

%sh
#loading the data to phonix using psql
cd ~/phxdemo
# wehn using a kerberoized cluster
id
kinit -kt /etc/security/keytabs/hbase.headless.keytab hbase-enchla@FIELD.HORTONWORKS.COM
# ./phoenix_load.sh

#sqoop from mysql to hdfs (csv) via map reduce (mysql must be installed on all nodes)
sqoop    import-all-tables   --direct  --connect jdbc:mysql://enhdpm/corp --username root -password admin

paragraphs.text:
%dep
z.reset 
z.load("/usr/hdp/2.6.5.0-292/phoenix/phoenix-4.7.0.2.6.5.0-292-client.jar") 
z.load("/usr/hdp/2.6.5.0-292/phoenix/lib/phoenix-spark-4.7.0.2.6.5.0-292.jar")
z.load("com.databricks:spark-csv_2.11:jar:1.5.0")
//make sure this are the correct versions, I think Iâ€™m working with a newer install.

%spark.spark

import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.phoenix.spark._
import sqlContext.implicits._

val schema = StructType( List (
    StructField("CUSTOMER_ID",IntegerType,true),   
    StructField("ACCOUNT_NUM",StringType,true),
    StructField("LNAME",StringType,true),   
    StructField("FNAME",StringType,true)
    ))

var df = sqlContext.read.format("com.databricks.spark.csv").option("header", "false").schema(schema).load("customer/part*")

df.printSchema()
df.show
df.write.format("org.apache.phoenix.spark").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).options(Map("table" -> "CORP.CUSTOMER","zkUrl" -> "enhdpm:2181:/hbase-unsecure")).save

  
//spark.version

paragraphs.text:
%spark2.spark

import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.phoenix.spark._
import sqlContext.implicits._

val schema = StructType( List (
    StructField("CUSTOMER_ID",StringType,true),   
    StructField("ACCOUNT_NUM",LongType,true),
    StructField("LNAME",StringType,true),   
    StructField("FNAME",StringType,true)
    ))

val df = spark
            .read
            .option("header", false)
            .schema(schema)
            .csv("data/customer/part*")

df.printSchema()
df.show
df.write.format("org.apache.phoenix.spark").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).options(Map("table" -> "CORP.CUSTOMER","zkUrl" -> "pathdpm:2181:/hbase-unsecure")).save

%spark2.pyspark
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
from pprint import pprint
#lines = sc.textFile("data/customer/part*")
#csv =lines.map(lambda line: line.split(","))
#csv2 = lines.map(lambda x: x.split(",")[:2])
#print csv2.take(2)
#print csv.take(2)

#type (rdd)
#df = rdd.toDF(["customer_id","account_num","lname","fname","mi","address1","address2","address3","address4","city","state_province","postal_code","country","customer_region_id","phone1","phone2","birthdate","marital_status","yearly_income","gender","total_children","num_children_at_home","education","date_accnt_opened","member_card","occupation","houseowner","num_cars_owned","fullname"])

#schema = StructType([   StructField('customer_id',StringType()),   StructField('account_num',IntegerType())    ])
schema = StructType([   
    StructField('CUSTOMER_ID',StringType()),   
    StructField('ACCOUNT_NUM',LongType()),
    StructField('LNAME',StringType()),   
    StructField('FNAME',StringType())
    ])

#"DataType", "NullType", "StringType", "BinaryType", "BooleanType", "DateType",
#    "TimestampType", "DecimalType", "DoubleType", "FloatType", "ByteType", "IntegerType",
#    "LongType", "ShortType", "ArrayType", "MapType", "StructField", "StructType"]
    
#df = csv2.toDF(schema)
#df = csv2.toDF(["customer_id","account_num"])
#df.withColumn("account_num",df["account_num"].cast(IntegerType()))

df=spark.read.csv("data/customer/part*",schema=schema)
#df=spark.read.csv("data/a.csv",schema=schema)
#df=spark.read.csv("data/a.csv")

#ndf = sqlc.createDataFrame(csv2,schema)

#sqlc = SQLContext(sc)
#df = sqlc.createDataFrame(csv2,schema)

df.printSchema()
sample=df.take(2)
pprint (sample)
#df.write.format("")

df.write \
  .format("org.apache.phoenix.spark") \
  .mode("overwrite") \
  .option("table", "CORP.CUSTOMER") \
  .option("zkUrl", "pathdpm:2181:/hbase-unsecure") \
  .save()
